name: 1-Introduction
content:
Introduction: Consumer Indexing from Consumer → DTR → Feeder


Objective:

To build a reliable mapping hierarchy connecting each consumer meter to its respective Distribution Transformer (DTR) and each DTR to its Feeder. This indexing is foundational for energy auditing, loss analysis, and operational optimization.


Why It Matters:

  • Enables granular energy loss tracking at each level of the network.
  • Facilitates targeted maintenance, fault detection, and load planning.
  • Critical for implementing AI/ML-based forecasting and smart grid management.
